# Micro.blog Posting Guide

**For Non-Technical Tribal Members**

## Overview

This guide shows you how to add blog posts, photos, and updates to waccamaw.org/updates/ **without using GitHub**. You'll post directly through Micro.blog's web interface - no coding required!

## When to Use This Guide

‚úÖ **Use Micro.blog interface when:**
- Adding a blog post about tribal events
- Sharing photos from ceremonies or gatherings
- Posting meeting announcements
- Updating tribal news
- Sharing community stories

‚ùå **Don't use this for:**
- Changing how the website looks (use GitHub - see [Template Change](.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/template_change.md))
- Fixing bugs (use GitHub - see [Bug Report](.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md))
- Modifying permanent pages like "About" (use GitHub - see [Content Update](.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/content_update.md))

---

## Quick Start: Post in 3 Steps

### 1. Log into Micro.blog

1. Go to [micro.blog](https://micro.blog)
2. Click **Sign In** (top right)
3. Enter your credentials (contact WaccamawChief@gmail.com if you don't have access)

### 2. Create Your Post

1. Click **New Post** button (top of page)
2. Type your content in the editor
3. Add photos if needed (click camera icon)
4. Click **Post** button

### 3. Verify It Published

1. Wait 2-3 minutes
2. Visit [waccamaw.org/updates/](https://waccamaw.org/updates/)
3. Your post should appear!

---

## Detailed Instructions

### Adding a Blog Post

#### Step 1: Start a New Post

![Micro.blog new post button location](placeholder-for-screenshot)

1. Log into [micro.blog](https://micro.blog)
2. Click **"New Post"** button (top of dashboard)
3. You'll see a simple editor

#### Step 2: Write Your Content

**Title (optional):**
- For titled posts (like "November Tribal Meeting"), add a title
- For short updates (like "Great turnout today!"), skip the title

**Content:**
- Write your post using the editor
- Keep it simple - just type naturally
- You can use **bold** and *italic* if you want

**Example Post:**
```
# November 2025 Tribal Meeting

We had an excellent turnout at last night's tribal council meeting. 

Key decisions:
- Approved budget for longhouse repairs
- Set date for December powwow
- Welcomed three new tribal members

Thank you to everyone who attended!
```

#### Step 3: Add Categories (Optional)

Categories help organize your posts:

- **meetings** - Tribal council meetings, special meetings
- **events** - Powwows, ceremonies, community gatherings
- **news** - General tribal news and announcements
- **community** - Community stories and updates
- **history** - Historical content and archives

To add categories:
1. Look for **"Categories"** field below editor
2. Type category name (e.g., "meetings")
3. Press Enter/Return
4. Add more if needed (e.g., "meetings, community")

#### Step 4: Publish

1. Review your post
2. Click **"Post"** button (bottom right)
3. Your post is live!

### Adding Photos

#### Method 1: Photos in a Post

1. Create a new post (as above)
2. Click the **camera icon** üì∑ in the editor toolbar
3. Select photo(s) from your computer
4. Photos will upload automatically
5. Add captions if desired
6. Click **"Post"** to publish

#### Method 2: Photo-Only Post

1. Click **"New Post"**
2. Click camera icon **without typing any text**
3. Upload photo(s)
4. Micro.blog will create a photo post automatically
5. Click **"Post"**

**Photo Tips:**
- Maximum size: 5MB per photo
- Recommended formats: JPG, PNG
- Photos are automatically optimized
- You can add multiple photos to one post

### Adding Photo Galleries

For event galleries with many photos:

1. Click **"New Post"**
2. Add a title (e.g., "2025 Fall Powwow Photos")
3. Click camera icon and select **all photos** for the gallery
4. Photos will upload as a grid
5. Add description text if desired
6. Add category: "events" or "photos"
7. Click **"Post"**

---

## Content Guidelines

### Writing Style

**Be clear and conversational:**
- ‚úÖ "We had 45 tribal members at last night's meeting!"
- ‚ùå "A total of 45 individuals were in attendance at the aforementioned gathering"

**Use proper names:**
- ‚úÖ "Chief Harold D. Hatcher welcomed everyone"
- ‚ùå "The chief said hello"

**Include dates and details:**
- ‚úÖ "Our next meeting is December 15, 2025 at 6:00 PM"
- ‚ùå "Next meeting soon"

### Photo Guidelines

**Always include:**
- Event name (e.g., "Fall Powwow 2025")
- Date the photo was taken
- Photo credit if taken by someone else

**Example caption:**
```
Longhouse construction progress - November 18, 2025
Photo by Michelle Hatcher
```

**Privacy considerations:**
- Get permission before posting photos of minors
- Don't post photos of sacred ceremonies without approval
- When in doubt, ask tribal leadership

### Sensitive Content

**Requires leadership approval:**
- Historical/cultural information
- Tribal governance decisions
- Land or legal matters
- Sacred ceremonies or traditions
- Photos involving minors

**Contact before posting:**
- Email: WaccamawChief@gmail.com
- Or ask at the next tribal meeting

---

## After You Post

### Verify Your Post

1. Wait **2-3 minutes** after posting
2. Visit [waccamaw.org/updates/](https://waccamaw.org/updates/)
3. Look for your post at the top
4. Click to view full post
5. Check photos loaded correctly

### Share Your Post

Every post has a unique URL you can share:

**Example:**
```
https://waccamaw.org/updates/2025/11/18/november-meeting/
```

You can share this link:
- On Facebook
- Via email
- In text messages
- With other tribal members

### Edit or Delete a Post

**To edit:**
1. Go to [micro.blog](https://micro.blog)
2. Find your post in the dashboard
3. Click **"Edit"**
4. Make changes
5. Click **"Update"**

**To delete:**
1. Find your post in the dashboard
2. Click **"..."** (more options)
3. Click **"Delete"**
4. Confirm deletion

---

## Common Questions

### Q: How long does it take for my post to appear?

**A:** Usually 2-3 minutes. Micro.blog needs to:
1. Save your post
2. Rebuild the website
3. Publish to the CDN
4. Update waccamaw.org

If it takes longer than 5 minutes, contact WaccamawChief@gmail.com.

### Q: Can I schedule posts for later?

**A:** Yes! When creating a post:
1. Look for **"Publish date"** option
2. Select future date and time
3. Click **"Post"**
4. It will publish automatically at that time

### Q: What if I make a mistake?

**A:** No worries! You can:
1. Edit the post (see "Edit or Delete" above)
2. Or delete and repost
3. Or contact WaccamawChief@gmail.com for help

### Q: Can I see a preview before posting?

**A:** Unfortunately, Micro.blog doesn't have a preview. But you can:
1. Post it
2. View it immediately at waccamaw.org/updates/
3. Edit if needed

### Q: What about the RSS feed?

**A:** Don't worry about this! RSS feeds update automatically when you post. Subscribers will see your post in their feed readers.

### Q: Can I upload videos?

**A:** Yes! Micro.blog supports:
- Short videos (under 2 minutes)
- Maximum size: 100MB
- Formats: MP4, MOV

Upload videos the same way as photos (camera icon).

---

## Formatting Tips

### Basic Formatting

**Bold text:**
```
**This text will be bold**
```

**Italic text:**
```
*This text will be italic*
```

**Links:**
```
[Click here](https://example.com)
```

**Headings:**
```
# Large Heading
## Medium Heading
### Small Heading
```

**Lists:**
```
- First item
- Second item
- Third item

Or numbered:

1. First item
2. Second item
3. Third item
```

### Example Formatted Post

```
# Fall Powwow 2025 - Huge Success!

We had an **incredible** turnout at this year's powwow!

## Highlights

- Over 200 attendees
- 15 drummers from 4 tribes
- Beautiful weather all weekend
- Delicious food from local vendors

## Photos

[See photo gallery here](/photos/2025-fall-powwow)

*Thank you to everyone who made this possible!*

Next powwow: **Spring 2026** - save the date!
```

## Getting Help

### Micro.blog Support

- **Micro.blog Help**: [help.micro.blog](https://help.micro.blog)
- **Email Support**: help@micro.blog

### Tribal Website Support

- **Email**: WaccamawChief@gmail.com
- **Twitter**: [@Waccamaw_SC](https://twitter.com/Waccamaw_SC)

### Technical Issues

If the website is down or posts aren't appearing:

1. Wait 10 minutes (sometimes just slow)
2. Check [micro.blog/status](https://micro.blog) for outages
3. Email WaccamawChief@gmail.com
4. Create a [bug report](.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md) on GitHub (if you have access)

## Advanced: Markdown Reference

Micro.blog uses **Markdown** for formatting. Here's a quick reference:

### Text Formatting

```markdown
**bold text**
*italic text*
~~strikethrough~~
`code or technical terms`
```

### Links

```markdown
[Link text](https://example.com)
[Waccamaw Homepage](https://waccamaw.org)
```

### Images

```markdown
![Description of image](/path/to/image.jpg)
```

### Headings

```markdown
# Heading 1 (largest)
## Heading 2
### Heading 3
#### Heading 4
```

### Lists

```markdown
Unordered:
- Item 1
- Item 2
  - Sub-item 2.1
  - Sub-item 2.2

Ordered:
1. First
2. Second
3. Third
```

### Quotes

```markdown
> This is a quoted passage
> It can span multiple lines
```

### Horizontal Line

```markdown
---
```

## Comparison: Micro.blog vs GitHub

### Use Micro.blog When:

| Task | Use Micro.blog? |
|------|-----------------|
| Add blog post | ‚úÖ Yes |
| Share photos | ‚úÖ Yes |
| Post meeting notes | ‚úÖ Yes |
| Announce events | ‚úÖ Yes |
| Quick updates | ‚úÖ Yes |

### Use GitHub When:

| Task | Use GitHub? |
|------|-------------|
| Change website design | ‚úÖ Yes |
| Fix bugs | ‚úÖ Yes |
| Modify templates | ‚úÖ Yes |
| Update About page | ‚úÖ Yes |
| Add new features | ‚úÖ Yes |

**Rule of thumb:**
- **Adding content?** ‚Üí Micro.blog (this guide)
- **Changing code?** ‚Üí GitHub (see [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md))

## Example Workflows

### Workflow 1: Post Meeting Notes

1. Attend tribal meeting
2. Take notes (paper or phone)
3. Within 24 hours:
   - Log into micro.blog
   - Click "New Post"
   - Add title: "November 2025 Tribal Meeting"
   - Paste your notes
   - Add category: "meetings"
   - Click "Post"
4. Share the link with members who couldn't attend

### Workflow 2: Share Event Photos

1. Take photos at event
2. Select best 10-15 photos
3. Same day or next day:
   - Log into micro.blog
   - Click "New Post"
   - Add title: "[Event Name] Photos"
   - Upload all selected photos
   - Add brief description
   - Add category: "events" or "photos"
   - Click "Post"
4. Share on tribal Facebook page

### Workflow 3: Announce Upcoming Event

1. Get event details from leadership
2. Log into micro.blog
3. Click "New Post"
4. Write announcement with:
   - Event name and date
   - Time and location
   - What to bring
   - RSVP info if applicable
5. Add category: "events"
6. Optional: Schedule for specific date/time
7. Click "Post"
8. Share announcement link

---

## Troubleshooting

### Post not appearing after 5 minutes

1. Check you clicked "Post" (not "Save Draft")
2. Verify you're logged into correct account
3. Check [micro.blog](https://micro.blog) dashboard - is post there?
4. Email WaccamawChief@gmail.com

### Photos not uploading

1. Check file size (must be under 5MB)
2. Try one photo at a time
3. Use JPG or PNG format
4. Try different browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari)
5. Contact help@micro.blog if still failing

### Formatting looks wrong

1. Check your Markdown syntax
2. Preview in Micro.blog dashboard
3. Edit and fix any issues
4. Update the post

### Can't log in

1. Verify your username and password
2. Try password reset
3. Check email for reset link
4. Contact WaccamawChief@gmail.com for access

---

## Best Practices

‚úÖ **Do:**
- Post regularly (keep site active)
- Use descriptive titles
- Add categories to posts
- Credit photo sources
- Proofread before posting
- Share posts on social media
- Respond to comments (if enabled)

‚ùå **Don't:**
- Post sensitive tribal business without approval
- Share photos of minors without permission
- Post during sacred ceremonies
- Copy content from other websites
- Post inflammatory or divisive content
- Ignore tribal member privacy
